name: LOCUST USA (reboot)
description:
Horror-Mystery-Exploration-Brick-Breaking with BOSS FIGHTS and 80s REFERENCES - fight a malevolent supercomputer, scour a dead guy's house for clues, collect keycards, banish a basement demon!

--

I wanted to try making this again, only this time with better code, bigger targets to hit so it wasn't as frustrating, no intrusive Random Event mechanics, and multi-room mysteries built in a nicer, easy-to-maintain way. Huge shoutout to Pascal Belisle for the massively inspirational work on The Trial of Kharzoid!

Options & Tutorial/Guide can be accessed immediately on running the game!

More mysteries to come... ?
